section.title: Id Annotation
section.p: An example with a generated id, note the definition of the Generator on global level.
section.source:
<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.elver.org/samples/emf/annotations/id" xmlns:ecore="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore" xmlns:lib="http://www.elver.org/samples/emf/annotations/id" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
<xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/SequenceGenerator" ecore:key="name">GENERATOR</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/SequenceGenerator" ecore:key="sequenceName">mySequenceName</xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation>
<xsd:complexType name="SimpleID"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="autoID" type="xsd:long"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Id">true</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/GeneratedValue">true</xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="TableID"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="myid" type="xsd:long"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Id">true</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/GeneratedValue" ecore:key="strategy">TABLE</xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="IdentityID"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="myid" type="xsd:long"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Id">true</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/GeneratedValue" ecore:key="strategy">IDENTITY</xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

section.title: Composite Id in Uml
section.p: The annotation for a composite id using a specific id class. Please read the documentation of Hibernate for all the requirements which apply to the composite id class.

section.title: Table and Column annotations
section.p: An example of the use of a Table annotation at EClass level and a Column annotation:
section.source: <xsd:complexType name="Book"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Table" ecore:key="name">MYBOOKTABLE</xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="title" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Column" ecore:key="name">titel</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Column" ecore:key="unique">true</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Column" ecore:key="length">25</xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="pages" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Column" ecore:key="updatable">false</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Column" ecore:key="insertable">false</xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="weight" type="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Column" ecore:key="name">GEWICHT</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Column" ecore:key="nullable">true</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Column" ecore:key="precision">5</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Column" ecore:key="scale">2</xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="author" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>

section.title: ManyToMany Annotations
section.p: An example of the use of a ManyToMany annotation:
section.source:
<xsd:complexType name="Cntr"> <xsd:sequence> xsd:element name="rght" type="xsd:IDREF" ecore:reference="this:Rght" maxOccurs="unbounded" ecore:opposite="cntr"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/ManyToMany" ecore:key="fetch">EAGER</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/ManyToMany" ecore:key="cascade">MERGE PERSIST</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/ManyToMany" ecore:key="targetEntity">Rght</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/JoinTable" ecore:key="name">RightCenter</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://annotation.elver.org/Indexed" ecore:key="value">false</xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="lft" type="xsd:IDREF" ecore:reference="this:Lft" maxOccurs="unbounded" ecore:opposite="cntr"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/ManyToMany" ecore:key="fetch">EAGER</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/ManyToMany" ecore:key="cascade">MERGE PERSIST</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/ManyToMany" ecore:key="targetEntity">Lft</xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="Lft"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cntr" type="xsd:IDREF" ecore:reference="this:Cntr" maxOccurs="unbounded" ecore:opposite="lft"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/ManyToMany" ecore:key="fetch">LAZY</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/ManyToMany" ecore:key="cascade">MERGE PERSIST</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/ManyToMany" ecore:key="targetEntity">Cntr</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/ManyToMany" ecore:key="mappedBy">lft</xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="Rght"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cntr" type="xsd:IDREF" ecore:reference="this:Cntr" maxOccurs="unbounded" ecore:opposite="rght"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/ManyToMany" ecore:key="fetch">LAZY</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/ManyToMany" ecore:key="cascade">MERGE PERSIST</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/ManyToMany" ecore:key="targetEntity">Cntr</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/ManyToMany" ecore:key="mappedBy">rght</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/JoinTable" ecore:key="name">RightCenter</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://annotation.elver.org/Indexed" ecore:key="value">false</xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>

section.title: Inheritance and Discriminator Annotations
section.p: An example of the use of an Inheritance and Discriminator related annotations:
section.source: <xsd:complexType name="Price"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Table" ecore:key="name">MYPRICE</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/Inheritance" ecore:key="strategy">SINGLE_TABLE</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/DiscriminatorColumn" ecore:key="name">DISCRIMINATOR</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/DiscriminatorColumn" ecore:key="discriminatorType">STRING</xsd:appinfo> <xsd:appinfo source="http://ejb.elver.org/DiscriminatorValue" ecore:key="value">myPrice</xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:decimal"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
